articles.title: 'Oppenheimer' dominates Golden Globes, 'Poor Things' upsets 'Barbie' in comedy - WTAE Pittsburgh
articles.description: Christopher Nolan's American epic "Oppenheimer" dominated the 81st Golden Globes, winning best drama, while Yorgos Lanthimos' "Poor Things" pulled off an upset victor over "Barbie" to triumph in the best comedy or musical category.
articles.content: Christopher Nolan's American epic "Oppenheimer" dominated the 81st Golden Globes, winning best drama, while Yorgos Lanthimos' "Poor Things" pulled off an upset victor over "Barbie" to triumph in the … [+6574 chars]

articles.content: The US is all set to witness the launch of its first private mission to the Moon on Monday (Jan 8). Considered a major milestone for NASAs plans to get humans back on the lunar surface in five decade… [+2147 chars]
